Automatic micropipettor of 0.1-2.5μl, accuracy with deviation + 1.4 % to - 1.4 %, coefficient of variation in less than 0.7 %, possibility to select a volume of at least 3 decimal places, with protection system from unintended change of the given volume. To be completely autoclavable and UV resistant, heat-resistant surface, acids, bases and bleaches. Possess CE / IVD certificate or equivalent and a calibration certificate from an independent accredited laboratory for calibration of pipettors. Have a warranty of at least 5 years.

automatic micropipettor with volume 2-20μl, (± 0.8 %), coefficient of variation <0.4 %, possibility for selecting a volume of at least 2 decimal places, with a system of protection against unintentional change to default volume. Have CE / IVD certificate or equivalent and certificate for calibration from an independent accredited laboratory for calibration of pipettors

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Contract Performance Guarantee: Bank Guarantee of 10 %.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: Statement by the economic operator that it has not been sentenced, in the last 5 years, with effective court decision for participation in criminal organisation, corruption, fraud or money laundering.
Certificate that it is not subject to bankruptcy procedure issued by competent authority.
Certificate that it is not subject to liquidation procedure issued by competent authority.
Certificate for paid taxes, contributions and other public dues by the competent authority in the country where that economic operator is established.

Certificate from the Legal Entities Penal Registry that it is not being imposed a side sanction — prohibition to participate in public competitions, public procurement contract award and public-private partnership contract award procedures.
Certificate from the Legal Entities Penal Registry that it is not being imposed a side sanction — temporary or permanent prohibition to perform certain professional activity.

Certificate that it is not being sanctioned for misdemeanor with an effective court decision, resulting in prohibition for pursuing professional activity or duty, i.e. temporary prohibition for performing certain business activity.
Ability of the economic operator to perform business activity:

Document for registered business activity. In order to prove the ability to perform professional activity, the economic operator should submit a document for registered activity as evidence that it is registered as a natural or legal person for performing the activity related to the subject of the public procurement contract or evidence that it belongs to a suitable professional association in accordance with the regulations of the country where it is registered. Evidence issued by a competent body for fulfilling the special conditions for performing the activity described in accordance with the law that relate to the subject of the contract, i.e. Certificate for wholesale of medical devices in accordance with the Law on medicines and medical devices.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: To participate on electronic auction economic operators need to register on ESPP (Electronic System for Public Procurement) website: www.e-nabavki.gov.mk.
Tender documentation, technical specification, forms and information for Open Procedure Nº 01/2018 are provided on the same website.

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: Electronically, ESJN (https://www.e-nabavki.gov.mk/); Ss. Cyril and Methodius University, Faculty of Medicine —Skopje, 50 Divizija Nº 6, 1000 Skopje, Republic of Macedonia

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: State Appeals Commission for Public Procurement
